channel.title: Partnership on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Partnership on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot now supports OpenCode
item.description:
GitHub announced a formal partnership with OpenCode that enables authentication of GitHub Copilot subscriptions (Pro, Pro+, Business, Enterprise) on the OpenCode platform, allowing subscribers to use Copilot with OpenCode.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: security: Stronger together: New Beazley collaboration enhances cyber resilience
item.description:
Microsoft announced a new collaboration with Beazley naming them an incident response partner to strengthen cyber resilience by aligning with ecosystem partners and improving security for customers.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog
